channel.title: Configuration on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Configuration on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: Delete text and check error message
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Remove all the text and save Error message should be displayed

item.title: Change text and check FO
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Remove the text, add another text (with color and some specific character)and save New text should be saved Go to front office New text should be displayed instead of the old one
